ownerships.owner: The Donald J. Trump Revocable Trust

familyMemberEthics.description: Former member/president of DJT Operations I LLC, in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. In 2017, Pres. Trump earned $1,000,001 - $5,000,000 in rent income from DJT OPERATIONS I LLC, valued at Over $50,000,000. Underlying Assets: aircraft. Location: New York, NY. See attached schedule.
